SOUTH KOREA INTERNATIONAL AUTUMN EXCHANGE PROGRAM 2023

Edutour by studec

Application Deadline :

15 October 2023

Seoul, South Korea

Visit Website

00

DESCRIPTION

SOUTH KOREA INTERNATIONAL AUTUMN EXCHANGE PROGRAM 2023 is an educational program combined with an exposure program in South Korea. This program encourages Asian youth with leadership, education, and understanding of new cultures, and heightens awareness through the skills of experienced speakers. This program aims to connect the Asian youth to the global network, observe what a company doing and understand not only the theory but also the practice, visit one of the best universities in South Korea, and learn how the ecosystem of student life, enhances their skills with the excursion program.

INSTRUCTORS

  • Mr. Arladian
  • Mr. Vladimirrahman

EVENT DETAILS

Duration :

23 - 25 October 2023

Eligibility criteria

No specific requirement for this program
